  ```{r}
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyRSS)
library(tibble)
library(tidytext)
library(dplyr)

feeds = c("http://feeds2.feedburner.com/InvestingRss",
          "https://www.cnbc.com/id/15839069/device/rss/rss.html",
          "http://feeds.marketwatch.com/marketwatch/topstories/",
          "http://feeds.marketwatch.com/marketwatch/StockstoWatch/",
          "http://feeds.marketwatch.com/marketwatch/marketpulse/")

Df = NULL
for (feed in feeds) {
  News.feed = unique(select(tidyfeed(feed, parse_dates = TRUE), 
                            "feed_title","item_description","item_pub_date","item_link"))
  Df = rbind(News.feed, Df)
}


ui = fluidPage(
  titlePanel(h4("Financial News of The Day")), 
  mainPanel(DT::dataTableOutput("table")
  ))

server = function(input, output) {
  output$table = DT::renderDataTable({
    Df},
    options = list(autoWidth = TRUE, 
                   columnDefs = list(list(width = '200px', 
                                          targets = "All",
                                          fontSize = '6px')),
                   pageLength = 25,
                   lengthMenu = c(10, 20, 25, 50, 100)
    ))}

shinyApp(ui, server)

```
